column3: Are you sure this this works for the CMD_REPLY / CMD_ERROR? Let's say type help, scroll up in the QTextEdit, click in somwhere (perhaps to copy) and type help again. I have a feeling you will see the line where you entered "help", but not the output.\n
It really works. I'm pulling off a trick to avoid that. Note that I don't move the cursor :)\n

If it does what I tried to achieve with my pull I'm fine with this one, if it's behaviour is different on Windows I'm a tad unhappy though :). I will test this as soon as it get's merged! Perhaps you can leave my pull open until then.\n
